text: Hello everyone!!! I am facing a very unfamiliar issue. Changing the default values in theme settings only gets reflected on the page after publishing,not on the page editor. Can anyone help me with this. Thanks:slightly_smiling_face:

Anyone found a good way to overwrite modules in a marketplace child theme in the IDE?

Right now the only way I've found is
1. Clone the marketplace theme (not a child theme), and the only way to actually do this know is to open a module which then give you the prompt. Can't right click the theme anymore
2. Then right click the module in the *cloned* theme and 'Move' to the *child* theme
3. Then *delete* the cloned theme
